ComicInfo.Summary: A gypsy cannot read the palms of a man with two hooks in place of hands.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 15:14:12. [CVDB166069] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:37:36. [Issue ID 250725]
